The Honorable Alison J. Nathan
March 1, 2021
Page 2
We now respectfully request that the deadline for filing the defendant's reply be moved to Monday, March 15, 2021. The next scheduled appearance before the Court is the first day of trial on July 12, 2021.
Sincerely,
/s/ Christian Everdell
